member.name: T:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for operating on System.IO.Stream objects.

member.summary: Copies the input stream to the output stream.
member.param: The input stream.
The output stream.
member.exception: input is not open for reading.
output is not open for writing.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamExtensions.CopyTo(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the input stream to the output stream using the supplied buffer size.
member.param: The input stream.
The output stream.
The size of the copy buffer.
member.exception: input is not open for reading.
output is not open for writing.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamExtensions.FindLastIndex(System.IO.Stream,System.Predicate{System.Int32})
member.summary: Searches for a byte that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire System.IO.Stream.
member.param: The stream instance.
The predicate delegate that defines the conditions of the byte to search for.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of a byte that matches the conditions defined by match, if found; otherwise, –1.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamExtensions.FindLastIndex(System.IO.Stream,System.Int64,System.Predicate{System.Int32})
member.summary: Searches for a byte that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the range of bytes in the System.IO.Stream that extends from the first byte to the specified index.
member.param: The stream instance.
The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
The predicate delegate that defines the conditions of the byte to search for.
member.exception: startIndex is less than zero -or- greater than stream length.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of a byte that matches the conditions defined by match, if found; otherwise, –1.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamPosition.Value
member.summary: Gets the last position of the stream.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.IO.StreamPosition.CheckBuffer
member.summary: Gets a byte array containing a number of bytes from the end of the last stream read.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Asymmetric class using the specified key size.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.Asymmetric.GetRsaProvider
member.summary: Returns the default RSA provider using the specified key size.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.Asymmetric.KeyContainerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the key container used to store this key on disk.

member.name: T:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricProvider
member.summary: Specifies the symmetric encryption algorithm.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricProvider.DES
member.summary: The Data Encryption Standard provider supports a 64 bit key only.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricProvider.RC2
member.summary: The Rivest Cipher 2 provider supports keys ranging from 40 to 128 bits, default is 128 bits.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricProvider.Rijndael
member.summary: The Rijndael (also known as AES) provider supports keys of 128, 192, or 256 bits with a default of 256 bits.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricProvider.TripleDES
member.summary: The TripleDES provider (also known as 3DES) supports keys of 128 or 192 bits with a default of 192 bits.

member.summary: Provides access to factory methods for creating SymmetricAlgorithm instances.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the SymmetricAlgorithm class based on the specified provider.
member.param: Provides the type of symmetric algorithm to create.
member.returns: The SymmetricAlgorithm object.

member.name: T:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.Symmetric
member.summary: Represents an object that performs symmetric encryption.
member.remarks: Symmetric encryption uses a single key to encrypt and decrypt. Both parties (encryptor and decryptor) must share the same secret key.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Symmetric class based on the specified provider.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Symmetric class based on the specified provider.

member.summary: Generates a random key.

member.summary: Ensures that the _crypto object has valid Key and IV prior to any attempt to encrypt or decrypt.

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum number of bytes allowed for this data; if 0, no limit.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes allowed for this data; if 0, no limit.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricKeyData.Bytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the byte representation of the data. This will be padded to MinBytes and trimmed to MaxBytes as necessary.

member.name: T:harlam357.Core.Security.Extensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for hexidecimal and base64 conversions.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Extensions.ToHex(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes to a Hex string representation.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Extensions.FromHex(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Hex string representation to an array of bytes.
member.exception: The length of value is not zero or a multiple of 2. -or- The format of value is invalid. value contains a non-hex character.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Extensions.ToBase64(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes to a Base64 string representation.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Extensions.FromBase64(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Base64 string representation to an array of bytes.
member.exception: The length of value, ignoring white-space characters, is not zero or a multiple of 4. -or- The format of value is invalid. value contains a non-base-64 character, more than two padding characters, or a non-white space-character among the padding characters.

member.name: T:harlam357.Core.Security.HashProvider

member.summary: Cyclic Redundancy Check provider, 32-bit.

member.summary: Secure Hashing Algorithm provider, SHA-1 variant, 160-bit.

member.summary: Secure Hashing Algorithm provider, SHA-2 variant, 256-bit.

member.summary: Secure Hashing Algorithm provider, SHA-2 variant, 384-bit.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.HashProvider.SHA512
member.summary: Secure Hashing Algorithm provider, SHA-2 variant, 512-bit.

member.name: F:harlam357.Core.Security.HashProvider.MD5

member.summary: Calculates the hash on a stream of arbitrary length.

member.summary: Calculates the hash for fixed length data.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Hash.Calculate(harlam357.Core.Security.Data,harlam357.Core.Security.Data)
member.summary: Calculates the hash for fixed length data with a prefixed salt value.
member.remarks: A "salt" value is random data prefixed to every hashed value to prevent common dictionary attacks.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Security.Hash.Calculate(System.IO.Stream,System.IProgress{System.Int32})
member.summary: Calculates the hash on a seekable stream while reporting progress.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.Security.Hash.Value
member.summary: Gets the previously calculated hash value.

member.name: T:harlam357.Core.Threading.Tasks.CurrentThreadTaskScheduler
member.summary: Provides a task scheduler that runs tasks on the current thread.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Threading.Tasks.CurrentThreadTaskScheduler.QueueTask(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Runs the provided Task synchronously on the current thread.
member.param: The task to be executed.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Threading.Tasks.CurrentThreadTaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Runs the provided Task synchronously on the current thread.
member.param: The task to be executed.
Whether the Task was previously queued to the scheduler.
member.returns: True if the Task was successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:harlam357.Core.Threading.Tasks.CurrentThreadTaskScheduler.GetScheduledTasks
member.summary: Gets the Tasks currently scheduled to this scheduler.
member.returns: An empty enumerable, as Tasks are never queued, only executed.

member.name: P:harlam357.Core.Threading.Tasks.CurrentThreadTaskScheduler.MaximumConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum degree of parallelism for this scheduler.
